testcases.steps: Login as Super Admin → Verify successful login → Navigate to Dashboard page
Login as Admin → Verify successful login → Navigate to Dashboard page
Login as Staff user → Verify successful login → Navigate to Dashboard page
Login as Student user → Verify successful login → Navigate to Dashboard page
Navigate to Dashboard → Locate application logo → Verify logo is visible and properly aligned
Login to Dashboard → Observe welcome message → Verify correct user name is displayed
Navigate to Dashboard → Click on Alerts/Notifications icon → Observe alerts panel
Navigate to Dashboard → Click on profile/logout option → Confirm logout action
Login to Dashboard → Observe left navigation menu → Verify all menu items are displayed
Navigate to Dashboard → Click collapse icon → Verify menu collapses → Click expand icon → Verify menu expands
Navigate to Dashboard → Locate student status pie chart → Verify chart loads with data
Navigate to Dashboard → Locate staff status pie chart → Verify chart loads with data
Navigate to Dashboard → Locate attendance bar chart → Verify bars are displayed correctly
Navigate to Dashboard → Locate subject score chart → Verify scores are displayed correctly
Navigate to Dashboard → Click profile icon → Select Settings option
